snippet.title: Call of Duty 4: "Rooftops" Launch Trailer & Main Release!
snippet.description:
Finally, the Main Release of Call of Duty 4: "Rooftops" Campaign is out and available for public! I myself have been waitting for too long for this as I put a lot of time, hard work and love in this. This campaign will get you through a full of action, stealth and mystery story, within four cool missions. Download it now and live the full experience! 

Download COD4: "Rooftops" Main Release:
https://www.mediafire.com/?0dsfqf15espb3v6

Moddb Release:
http://www.moddb.com/mods/cod4-rooftops-mappack/downloads/call-of-duty-4-rooftops-main-release

This Campaign is a result of huge amount of hard work for me.
I would really appretiate it if you people refered to me (SPi) as the only creator of this campaign. Any other assets I used from other companies, sites or people are not owned by me and they are all mentioned in the in-game credits.

The main part of this project is made with the official Call of Duty 4 Mod tools provided from Infinity Ward. This is a non-profitable project and I do not own any assets provided from Infinity Ward.

It has been more than FOUR years of development. Believe it or not, I initially started making this campaign more than four years ago by myself. It was planned to be one single medium sized map, but due to bad planning or no planning at all, I was putting more ideas into it and grew it larger and larger, and I had to learn and do it all. Taking into consideration other real life delays like school, exams, vacations etc, this takes us up to 4 years of development.

I am so glad I made it this far, and that the Main Release of "Rooftops" Campaign is finally out for public. I hope you all enjoy it and have a great time.
